name: Lost Prayer to the Sacred Winds
description:
For each point of "Bonus DMG" this card has, character deals +1 DMG.
End Phase: This card gains 1 point of "Bonus DMG." (Max 2 points)
(Can only be equipped by Catalyst Characters. Each Character can equip at most 1 Weapon.)

(Max 2 points)\n(Can only be equipped by <color=#FFFFFFFF>{SPRITE_PRESET#3201}Catalyst Characters</color>. Each Character can equip at most 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#3003}Weapon.)

storytitle: Boundless Blessing: Lost Prayer to the Sacred Winds
storytext: "When flowers bloom, when leaves sway, that is me who sings the songs of freedom, of the winds."
